ground_truth: Cafe customers are startled to see Indy and Elsa climb out of the sewer, wet and smelly. Indy looks around at the postcard-perfect setting and smiles. Indy's delight, however, is short-lived since Kazim and two other Turkish agents are running towards them with drawn guns. He grabs Elsa by the hand and the two of them run down the dock and leap into a motorboat. Indy fires up the engine and pulls away from the dock, but not before a Turkish agent jumps in with him. Elsa grabs the wheel and begins to steer the boat while Indy and the Turk trade punches. Kazim and his men rush to two more speedboats tied to the dock. They chase after Indy. Indy grapples with the Turkish agent. As Indy grips his arms, they see a gun in the agent's hand. It fires. As Indy fights with the Turk, he becomes aware of the speedboats behind him and two enormous freighters ahead of him, joined together by two giant ropes. Indy, having gained the advantage, leans on top of the Turkish agent. Indy finally delivers the punch that sends the Turkish agent flying overboard. Turning, Indy sees that Elsa has committed the speedboat to a course between the two freighters, now being pushed even closer together by a tugboat. It's purely academic at this point since the hulls of the two freighters loom up on either side of them like cavern walls. One enemy speedboat chases Indy between the two freighters. It's a race for daylight as the two freighters drift ever closer to one another. Indy's speedboat just manages to squeeze through the gap. But the enemy speedboat explodes as it is crushed between the two freighters, flying into the air and splashing back down into the water. They spin their boat around in a sharp half-circle to see Kazim's speedboat appear racing toward them. He stands in the moving boat, firing a machine gun at Indy and Elsa. The two boats race across the water nearly side-by-side. A chattering machine gun from Kazim's boat splinters the wood of Indy's boat, until finally the rear of the boat catches. The machine gun runs out of ammunition. Kazim puts it down and takes control of the wheel from one of the Turkish agents in the boat with him. As Indy's boat drifts toward the giant, turning propellers at the stern of another steamer, Kazim's boat draws up alongside and hits them. Indy steps into Kazim's boat. He knocks one of the Turkish agents to the deck, then turns his attention to Kazim. The two men trade punches as the boat spins helplessly in the churning water. Indy kicks Kazim in the face, knocking him into the water, then pulls him back into the boat, now being sucked through the churning water toward the steamer's giant propeller blades.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Bistro patrons are shocked to observe Indy and Elsa ascend out of the drain, damp and odorous. Indy gazes around at the postcard-perfect scenery and grins. Indy's happiness, however, is fleeting since Kazim and two additional Turkish operatives are sprinting towards them with withdrawn pistols. He snatches Elsa by the hand and the duo dash down the pier and leap into a motorboat. Indy ignites the engine and moves away from the pier, but not before a Turkish operative vaults in with him. Elsa seizes the helm and begins to navigate the craft while Indy and the Turk exchange blows. Kazim and his associates hurry to two additional speedboats secured to the pier. They pursue Indy. Indy wrestles with the Turkish operative. As Indy secures his arms, they observe a pistol in the operative's hand. It discharges. As Indy struggles with the Turk, he becomes cognizant of the speedboats behind him and two colossal cargo ships ahead of him, linked together by two immense cables. Indy, having seized the upper hand, reclines on top of the Turkish operative. Indy ultimately delivers the blow that sends the Turkish operative tumbling overboard. Turning, Indy perceives that Elsa has committed the speedboat to a trajectory between the two cargo ships, now being nudged even closer together by a towboat. It's purely theoretical at this juncture since the hulls of the two cargo ships rise up on either side of them like cavern walls. One adversary speedboat pursues Indy between the two cargo ships. It's a dash for daylight as the two cargo ships drift ever nearer to one another. Indy's speedboat just succeeds to squeeze through the opening. But the adversary speedboat ruptures as it is compressed between the two cargo ships, soaring into the air and splashing back down into the sea. They swivel their craft around in a brisk half-circle to perceive Kazim's speedboat emerge accelerating toward them. He stands in the moving craft, discharging a machine pistol at Indy and Elsa. The two craft race across the sea almost side-by-side. A rattling machine pistol from Kazim's craft shatters the timber of Indy's craft, until ultimately the rear of the craft catches. The machine pistol exhausts its ammunition. Kazim sets it down and assumes command of the helm from one of the Turkish operatives in the craft with him. As Indy's craft drifts toward the immense, turning propellers at the stern of another vessel, Kazim's craft draws up alongside and strikes them. Indy steps into Kazim's craft. He punches one of the Turkish operatives to the deck, then turns his focus to Kazim. The two men exchange blows as the craft spins ineffectively in the swirling sea. Indy kicks Kazim in the visage, knocking him into the sea, then pulls him back into the craft, now being pulled through the swirling sea toward the vessel's immense propeller blades.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Cafe customers are startled by seeing Indy and Elsa climb out of the sewer, wet and smelly. The postcard-perfect setting is looked around at by Indy, and he smiles. Indy's delight, however, is short-lived since Kazim and two other Turkish agents are seen running towards them with drawn guns. Elsa is grabbed by the hand by him, and down the dock, they run, leaping into a motorboat. The engine is fired up by Indy, and the dock is pulled away from by him, but not before one of the Turkish agents jumps in with him. The wheel is grabbed by Elsa, and she begins to steer the boat while punches are traded with the Turk by Indy. Kazim and his men rush to two more speedboats tied to the dock. They chase Indy. The Turkish agent grapples with Indy. As the agent's arms are gripped by Indy, he sees a gun in the agent's hand, and it fires. As the Turk is fought with by Indy, the speedboats behind him and two enormous freighters ahead of him are noticed by him, joined together by two giant ropes. The advantage is gained by Indy, and he leans on top of the Turkish agent. Finally, the punch that sends the Turkish agent flying overboard is delivered by Indy. Turning, Indy sees that the speedboat is committed by Elsa to a course between the two freighters, now being pushed even closer together by a tugboat. It's purely academic at this point since the hulls of the two freighters loom up on either side of them like cavern walls. Indy is chased by one enemy speedboat between the two freighters. It's a race for daylight as the two freighters drift ever closer to one another. The gap is just managed to be squeezed through by Indy's speedboat. But the enemy speedboat explodes as it is crushed between the two freighters, flying into the air and splashing back down into the water. Their boat is spun around in a sharp half-circle by them to see Kazim's speedboat appear racing toward them. He stands in the moving boat and fires a machine gun at Indy and Elsa. The water is raced across by the two boats nearly side-by-side. Kazim's boat splinters the wood of Indy's boat with a chattering machine gun until finally, the rear of the boat is caught. The ammunition of the machine gun runs out. Kazim puts it down and takes control of the wheel from one of the Turkish agents in the boat with him. As the giant, turning propellers at the stern of another steamer are drifted toward by Indy's boat, Kazim's boat draws up alongside and hits them. Kazim's boat is stepped into by Indy. One of the Turkish agents is knocked to the deck by him, and then his attention is turned to Kazim. The men trade punches as the boat spins helplessly in the churning water. Kazim is kicked in the face by Indy, knocking him into the water, then he is pulled back into the boat by Indy, now being sucked through the churning water toward the steamer's giant propeller blades.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Cafe patrons are shocked as Indy and Elsa emerge from the sewer, wet and smelly. Indy, initially delighted by the picturesque setting, is interrupted by Kazim and two Turkish agents charging at them with guns. He grabs Elsa and they sprint down the dock, leaping into a motorboat. Indy starts the engine, but a Turkish agent jumps aboard. As Elsa steers, Indy and the agent exchange blows. Kazim and his men pursue in two speedboats. Indy struggles with the agent and notices the pursued speedboats and two large freighters tethered by ropes. Gaining the upper hand, Indy punches the agent overboard. Elsa navigates the speedboat between the freighters, squeezing through as they close in. The enemy speedboat explodes, crushed between the freighters. They spin around to see Kazim's boat approaching, firing a machine gun. The boats race side-by-side until Kazim's gun runs out of ammo. Kazim seizes the wheel, while Indy's boat drifts toward the steamer's propellers. Indy boards Kazim's boat, defeats a Turkish agent, and turns to Kazim. They brawl as the boat spins toward the propeller. Indy kicks Kazim into the water, rescues him, and pulls him back aboard, as they are dragged towards the steamer's massive blades.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Cafe customers are shocked as Indy and Elsa emerge from the sewer, wet and smelly. Indy smiles at the perfect setting, but Kazim and two Turkish agents rush at them with guns. Indy grabs Elsa, they leap into a motorboat, and as Indy starts the engine, a Turkish agent joins them. Elsa steers while Indy fights the Turk. Kazim and his men pursue in speedboats. Indy subdues the agent, sending him overboard, as Elsa steers between two giant freighters. One enemy speedboat follows but is crushed and explodes. Kazim's boat appears, firing a machine gun. Indy and Elsa's boat is hit, but Kazim's gun runs out of ammo. As Indy's boat drifts toward a giant propeller, Kazim's boat hits them. Indy boards Kazim's boat, knocks an agent down, and fights Kazim. Indy kicks Kazim into the water, then pulls him back as the boat is drawn toward the propeller blades.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Cafe patrons are taken aback and thoroughly shocked when they witness Indy and Elsa emerging unexpectedly from the depths of the sewer, both thoroughly drenched and emitting an unappealing odor. Indy surveys the idyllic and picturesque surroundings with a contented smile spreading across his face, savoring the moment. Indy's moment of joy, however, is abruptly interrupted and cut short when he notices Kazim, along with two additional Turkish agents, rapidly approaching them, their guns drawn and ready for action. Reacting swiftly, Indy seizes Elsa's hand firmly, and together they dash down the dock, sprinting with urgency, before making a daring leap into a nearby motorboat. Indy promptly ignites the engine and maneuvers away from the dock, but not before a Turkish agent makes a split-second decision and jumps in with him. Elsa decisively takes control of the wheel, steering the boat with determination, while Indy and the Turk engage in a fierce exchange of punches. Meanwhile, Kazim and his men quickly hurry to two additional speedboats that are conveniently tied to the dock, beginning their pursuit of Indy. Indy finds himself locked in a struggle with the Turkish agent. As Indy firmly grips the agent's arms, he suddenly notices a gun clutched in the agent's hand. It discharges unexpectedly. Amidst this intense altercation with the Turk, Indy becomes acutely aware of the speedboats trailing behind him and the two massive freighters looming ahead, joined by two substantial, giant ropes. With renewed determination, Indy gains the upper hand and manages to position himself advantageously atop the Turkish agent. Indy ultimately delivers a powerful punch that sends the Turkish agent hurtling overboard. Turning his attention back to the situation at hand, Indy sees that Elsa has committed their speedboat to a daring course, navigating between the two enormous freighters, which are now being gradually pushed closer together by the force of a tugboat. At this point of no return, the imposing hulls of the two freighters rise ominously on either side, resembling towering cavern walls. One enemy speedboat closely follows Indy into the narrowing gap between the two freighters. It's a tense race for daylight as the two freighters drift perilously closer to each other. Indy's speedboat barely manages to squeeze through the diminishing gap. However, the enemy speedboat is not as fortunate, as it explodes dramatically when it becomes trapped between the two freighters, soaring into the air before splashing back down into the water. Indy and Elsa quickly execute a sharp half-circle maneuver with their boat to face Kazim's speedboat as it comes into view, racing toward them. Kazim stands boldly in the moving boat, brandishing a machine gun and firing at Indy and Elsa. The two boats speed across the water, nearly side-by-side, in a tense pursuit. The relentless chatter of Kazim's machine gun splinters the wooden structure of Indy's boat, until ultimately, the rear of the boat catches a bullet. The machine gun soon runs out of ammunition. Kazim places the weapon aside and seizes control of the wheel from one of the Turkish agents accompanying him in the boat. As Indy's boat drifts perilously closer to the massive, turning propellers at the stern of another steamer, Kazim's boat draws up alongside and collides with them. Indy seizes the opportunity and steps boldly into Kazim's boat. He swiftly knocks one of the Turkish agents to the deck, then shifts his focus to Kazim himself. The two men engage in a heated exchange of punches as the boat spins helplessly in the turbulent, churning waters. In a decisive move, Indy kicks Kazim squarely in the face, sending him plunging into the water, but then he quickly pulls him back into the boat, now dangerously being sucked through the churning water toward the steamer's enormous and menacing propeller blades.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Cafe patrons, who are quietly enjoying their meals and conversations, are suddenly taken aback and thoroughly shocked when they unexpectedly witness Indy and Elsa emerging from the depths of the sewer. Both are thoroughly drenched in water and emitting a distinctly unappealing odor that fills the air. Indy takes a moment to survey his idyllic and picturesque surroundings, and a contented smile slowly spreads across his face as he savors this brief moment of respite. However, Indy's fleeting moment of joy is abruptly interrupted and cut short when he notices Kazim, accompanied by two additional Turkish agents, rapidly approaching them, their guns drawn and ready for swift action. Reacting with remarkable swiftness, Indy seizes Elsa's hand firmly in his own, and together they dash down the dock, sprinting with a palpable sense of urgency, before making a daring and adrenaline-fueled leap into a nearby motorboat. Without hesitation, Indy promptly ignites the engine and maneuvers the boat away from the dock, but not before a Turkish agent makes a daring, split-second decision and leaps in with him. Elsa, showing great resolve, decisively takes control of the wheel, steering the boat with determination and focus, while Indy and the Turk engage in a fierce and intense exchange of punches. Meanwhile, Kazim and his men quickly hurry to two additional speedboats that are conveniently tied to the dock, wasting no time as they begin their relentless pursuit of Indy. Indy finds himself locked in a tense struggle with the Turkish agent. As Indy firmly grips the agent's arms, he suddenly becomes aware of a gun clutched tightly in the agent's hand. It discharges unexpectedly, adding to the chaos of the moment. Amidst this intense altercation with the Turk, Indy becomes acutely aware of the speedboats trailing closely behind him and the two massive freighters looming ahead, joined ominously by two substantial, giant ropes. With renewed determination and focus, Indy gains the upper hand and manages to position himself advantageously atop the Turkish agent. Indy ultimately delivers a powerful punch that sends the Turkish agent hurtling overboard into the water. Turning his attention back to the critical situation at hand, Indy sees that Elsa has committed their speedboat to a daring course, navigating bravely between the two enormous freighters, which are now being gradually pushed closer together by the relentless force of a tugboat. At this point of no return, the imposing hulls of the two freighters rise ominously on either side, resembling towering cavern walls. One enemy speedboat closely follows Indy into the rapidly narrowing gap between the two freighters. It's a tense race for daylight as the two freighters drift perilously closer to each other, closing the gap bit by bit. Indy's speedboat barely manages to squeeze through the diminishing gap. However, the enemy speedboat is not as fortunate; it explodes dramatically when it becomes trapped between the two freighters, soaring into the air before splashing back down into the water in a spectacular display. Indy and Elsa quickly execute a sharp half-circle maneuver with their boat to face Kazim's speedboat as it comes into view, racing determinedly toward them. Kazim stands boldly in the moving boat, brandishing a machine gun with a menacing intent as he fires at Indy and Elsa. The two boats speed across the water, nearly side-by-side, in a tense and thrilling pursuit. The relentless chatter of Kazim's machine gun splinters the wooden structure of Indy's boat, and eventually, the rear of the boat catches a bullet. The machine gun soon runs out of ammunition. Kazim places the weapon aside and seizes control of the wheel from one of the Turkish agents accompanying him in the boat. As Indy's boat drifts perilously closer to the massive, turning propellers at the stern of another imposing steamer, Kazim's boat draws up alongside and collides with them. Indy seizes the opportunity and steps boldly into Kazim's boat. He swiftly knocks one of the Turkish agents to the deck, then shifts his focus to Kazim himself. The two men engage in a heated and intense exchange of punches as the boat spins helplessly in the turbulent, churning waters. In a decisive move, Indy kicks Kazim squarely in the face with force, sending him plunging into the water, but then he quickly pulls him back into the boat, now dangerously being sucked through the churning water toward the steamer's enormous and menacing propeller blades.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: As the scene unfolds, cafe customers experience a jolt of surprise, their eyes widening in disbelief as they witness Indy and Elsa emerging from the depths of the sewer, their clothes drenched and emitting an unmistakably pungent odor. Indy takes a moment to survey his surroundings, the postcard-perfect setting bringing a brief smile to his face. However, this fleeting joy quickly dissipates when he spots Kazim and two other Turkish agents charging towards them with guns drawn, determination etched on their faces. Without hesitation, he seizes Elsa's hand, and together, they sprint down the dock, urgency in their steps, before leaping into a nearby motorboat. Indy ignites the engine, feeling the immediate rumble beneath him as he expertly maneuvers the boat away from the dock, only to realize that a Turkish agent has managed to leap in with them. Elsa instinctively takes control of the wheel, her focus intense as she begins to steer the boat while Indy engages in a physical struggle with the Turk, their bodies swaying with each punch exchanged. Meanwhile, Kazim and his men, not missing a beat, rush to the two speedboats tethered to the dock, igniting their engines to give chase. Indy continues to grapple with the Turkish agent, his grip tightening as they both become aware of the gun now visible in the agent's hand. A shot rings out, heightening the tension. As Indy battles the Turk, his awareness sharpens to the danger closing in from all sides, with speedboats in pursuit behind and two massive freighters ahead, their structures tethered by ropes. Seizing an advantage, Indy manages to overpower the Turkish agent, leaning into him before delivering a powerful punch that sends him hurtling overboard. Turning his attention back to their boat, Indy observes Elsa's committed navigation path, directing them between the narrowing space between the two looming freighters, now pushed even closer by an assisting tugboat. With no other options, Indy and Elsa brace as the towering hulls close in on either side, their boat just narrowly slipping through the ever-constricting gap. The intense race for survival reaches a climax as the pursuer's speedboat attempts to follow, only to meet its demise when it's caught and crushed between the massive vessels, erupting in a dramatic explosion that sends debris soaring before crashing back into the water. With a swift maneuver, they spin their boat in a sharp half-circle, their eyes catching Kazim's speedboat approaching at a rapid pace. Kazim stands with resolve, discharging a machine gun towards Indy and Elsa, the chattering bullets splintering the wooden structure of their boat, which finally catches fire at the rear. As the machine gun clicks empty, Kazim discards it and assumes control of his vessel's wheel from another Turkish agent. Indy's boat, now drifting perilously close to the turning propellers at the stern of another steamer, is suddenly rammed by Kazim's boat as it draws alongside. In a bold move, Indy steps into Kazim's boat, swiftly incapacitating one of the agents with a decisive blow before turning his full attention to Kazim. The clash sees them exchange a series of furious punches, their bodies swaying with the boat's uncontrollable spins in the turbulent waters. With a well-placed kick to the face, Indy sends Kazim into the water, but he quickly hauls him back into the boat, now ominously being dragged by the intense currents toward the steamer's enormous propeller blades, the threat of destruction looming nearer with each passing moment.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Indy and Elsa emerge from the sewer into a picturesque cafe setting, only to be pursued by Kazim and his armed men. Grabbing Elsa's hand, Indy leads them to a motorboat, escaping just as a Turkish agent jumps aboard. With Elsa steering, Indy engages in a fistfight with the intruder, ultimately tossing him overboard as they navigate between two converging freighters. The pursuing speedboat is crushed in the narrowing gap, leaving only Kazim's boat, which fires on Indy and Elsa until the ammunition runs out. In a daring maneuver, Indy boards Kazim's boat, dispatching one agent before confronting Kazim. As the boats spin dangerously close to a steamer's propellers, Indy kicks Kazim into the water, then pulls him back, averting disaster as they are drawn toward the blades.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Cafe customers, enjoying their morning in a picturesque café reminiscent of a quaint European scene, are startled to see Indy and Elsa climb out of the sewer, wet and smelly. The café, located in the vibrant port city of Istanbul, buzzes with curious onlookers. Indy looks around at the postcard-perfect setting, where the iconic silhouette of the Hagia Sophia can be seen in the distance, and smiles. Indy's delight, however, is short-lived since Kazim, part of a secret Turkish faction with ties to historical artifact protection, and two other Turkish agents are running towards them with drawn guns. He grabs Elsa by the hand and the two of them run down the dock, a bustling area filled with local fishermen, and leap into a motorboat. Indy fires up the engine, a classic model known for its reliability among the city's waterways, and pulls away from the dock, but not before a Turkish agent jumps in with him. Elsa grabs the wheel, her boating skills honed from summers spent on the Aegean Sea, and begins to steer the boat while Indy and the Turk trade punches. Kazim and his men rush to two more speedboats tied to the dock, expertly maneuvering with the precision often seen in Istanbul's competitive speedboat races. They chase after Indy. Indy grapples with the Turkish agent, a man trained in close-quarters combat. As Indy grips his arms, they see a gun in the agent's hand, a standard issue for their covert operations. It fires. As Indy fights with the Turk, he becomes aware of the speedboats behind him and two enormous freighters ahead of him, joined together by two giant ropes, reminiscent of the treacherous shipping lanes that crisscross the Bosphorus Strait. Indy, having gained the advantage, leans on top of the Turkish agent. Indy finally delivers the punch that sends the Turkish agent flying overboard. Turning, Indy sees that Elsa has committed the speedboat to a course between the two freighters, now being pushed even closer together by a tugboat, a common sight in these busy waters. It's purely academic at this point since the hulls of the two freighters loom up on either side of them like cavern walls. One enemy speedboat chases Indy between the two freighters. It's a race for daylight as the two freighters drift ever closer to one another. Indy's speedboat just manages to squeeze through the gap. But the enemy speedboat explodes as it is crushed between the two freighters, flying into the air and splashing back down into the water. They spin their boat around in a sharp half-circle to see Kazim's speedboat appear racing toward them, a model that was once a favorite of the Ottoman empire's naval scouts. He stands in the moving boat, firing a machine gun, a relic from World War I, at Indy and Elsa. The two boats race across the water nearly side-by-side. A chattering machine gun from Kazim's boat splinters the wood of Indy's boat, a craft prized for its sturdy construction, until finally the rear of the boat catches. The machine gun runs out of ammunition. Kazim puts it down and takes control of the wheel from one of the Turkish agents in the boat with him, showcasing his versatility as a leader. As Indy's boat drifts toward the giant, turning propellers at the stern of another steamer, an engineering marvel of the modern shipping industry, Kazim's boat draws up alongside and hits them. Indy steps into Kazim's boat. He knocks one of the Turkish agents to the deck, then turns his attention to Kazim. The two men trade punches as the boat spins helplessly in the churning water. Indy kicks Kazim in the face, knocking him into the water, then pulls him back into the boat, now being sucked through the churning water toward the steamer's giant propeller blades, a menacing sight that emphasizes the peril of this high-stakes chase.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. But the enemy speedboat explodes as it is crushed between the two freighters flying into the air and splashing back down into the water. They spin their boat around in a sharp halfcircle to see Kazim's speedboat appear racing toward them. He stands in the moving boat firing a machine gun at Indy and Elsa. The machine gun runs out of ammunition. Kazim puts it down and takes control of the wheel from one of the Turkish agents in the boat with him. As Indy's boat drifts toward the giant turning propellers at the stern of another steamer Kazim's boat draws up alongside and hits them. Indy steps into Kazim's boat. He knocks one of the Turkish agents to the deck then turns his attention to Kazim. The two men trade punches as the boat spins helplessly in the churning water. Indy kicks Kazim in the face knocking him into the water then pulls him back into the boat now being sucked through the churning water toward the steamer's giant propeller blades.

On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. It is purely academic at this point since the hulls of the two freighters loom up on either side of them like cavern walls. One enemy speedboat chases Indy between the two freighters. It is a race for daylight as the two freighters drift ever closer to one another. Indy's speedboat just manages to squeeze through the gap. But the enemy speedboat explodes as it is crushed between the two freighters flying into the air and splashing back down into the water. They spin their boat around in a sharp halfcircle to see Kazim's speedboat appear racing toward them. He stands in the moving boat firing a machine gun at Indy and Elsa. The two boats race across the water nearly sidebyside. A chattering machine gun from Kazim's boat splinters the wood of Indy's boat until finally the rear of the boat catches. The machine gun runs out of ammunition. Kazim puts it down and takes control of the wheel from one of the Turkish agents in the boat with him. As Indy's boat drifts toward the giant turning propellers at the stern of another steamer Kazim's boat draws up alongside and hits them. Indy steps into Kazim's boat. He knocks one of the Turkish agents to the deck then turns his attention to Kazim. The two men trade punches as the boat spins helplessly in the churning water. Indy kicks Kazim in the face knocking him into the water then pulls him back into the boat now being sucked through the churning water toward the steamer's giant propeller blades.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: Cafe customers are startled to see Indy and Elsa climb out of the sewer wet and smelly. Indy looks around at the postcardperfect setting and smiles. Indy's delight however is shortlived since Kazim and two other Turkish agents are running towards them with drawn guns. He grabs Elsa by the hand and the two of them run down the dock and leap into a motorboat. Indy fires up the engine and pulls away from the dock but not before a Turkish agent jumps in with him. Elsa grabs the wheel and begins to steer the boat while Indy and the Turk trade punches. Kazim and his men rush to two more speedboats tied to the dock. They chase after Indy. A chattering machine gun from Kazim's boat splinters the wood of Indy's boat until finally the rear of the boat catches. The machine gun runs out of ammunition. Kazim puts it down and takes control of the wheel from one of the Turkish agents in the boat with him. As Indy's boat drifts toward the giant turning propellers at the stern of another steamer Kazim's boat draws up alongside and hits them. Indy steps into Kazim's boat. He knocks one of the Turkish agents to the deck then turns his attention to Kazim. The two men trade punches as the boat spins helplessly in the churning water. Indy kicks Kazim in the face knocking him into the water then pulls him back into the boat now being sucked through the churning water toward the steamer's giant propeller blades.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: Cafe customers are startled to see Indy and Elsa climb out of the sewer wet and smelly. Indy looks around at the postcardperfect setting and smiles. Indy's delight however is shortlived since Kazim and two other Turkish agents are running towards them with drawn guns. Indy steps into Kazim's boat. He knocks one of the Turkish agents to the deck then turns his attention to Kazim. The two men trade punches as the boat spins helplessly in the churning water. Indy kicks Kazim in the face knocking him into the water then pulls him back into the boat now being sucked through the churning water toward the steamer's giant propeller blades.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Office workers are amused to see Luna and Max emerge from the elevator, dry and laughing. Luna glances around at the painting-perfect skyline and frowns. Luna’s irritation, however, is short-lived since Jasper and two other French cooks are strolling toward them with unsheathed forks. She releases Max by the shoulder and the pair of them stroll down the hallway and dive into a go-kart. Luna powers up the lights and drifts away from the hallway, but not before a French cook hops in with her. Max clutches the map and starts to navigate the kart while Luna and the Frenchman exchange tickles. Jasper and his crew dash to two more scooters parked at the corridor. They roll after Luna. Luna wrestles with the French cook. As Luna clasps his feet, they notice a pen in the cook’s pocket. It writes. As Luna giggles with the Frenchman, she becomes aware of the scooters beside her and two massive trucks ahead of her, linked together by two huge chains. Luna, having gained the upper hand, leans on top of the French cook. Luna finally administers the tickle that sends the French cook hopping overboard. Twirling, Luna notices that Max has directed the go-kart to a path between the two trucks, now being nudged even closer together by a forklift. It’s purely theoretical at this point since the sides of the two trucks rise up on either side of them like canyon walls. One rival scooter follows Luna between the two trucks. It’s a sprint for sunlight as the two trucks slide ever closer to each other. Luna’s go-kart barely manages to squeeze through the space. But the rival scooter combusts as it is squished between the two trucks, leaping into the sky and plummeting back down onto the pavement. They whirl their kart around in a gentle half-square to notice Jasper’s scooter appear zooming toward them. He stands in the moving scooter, tossing a beach ball at Luna and Max. The two karts zoom across the pavement nearly side-by-side. A bouncing beach ball from Jasper’s scooter fragments the glass of Luna’s kart, until finally the front of the kart snags. The beach ball runs out of air. Jasper sets it aside and takes control of the map from one of the French cooks in the scooter with him. As Luna’s kart glides toward the massive, spinning windmills at the front of another turbine, Jasper’s scooter pulls up alongside and bumps them. Luna steps into Jasper’s scooter. She nudges one of the French cooks off the cushion, then turns her gaze to Jasper. The two chefs exchange tickles as the scooter circles aimlessly in the swirling breeze. Luna taps Jasper on the elbow, nudging him into the breeze, then drags him back into the scooter, now being carried through the swirling breeze toward the turbine’s massive windmill blades.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Indy and Elsa emerge from a sewer, startling cafe customers. Their relief is brief as Kazim and Turkish agents chase them. They board a motorboat, pursued by agents. Elsa steers while Indy fights an agent, eventually ejecting him overboard. Racing between two freighters, Indy's boat slips through, but a pursuing speedboat crashes and explodes. Kazim fires at Indy and Elsa as the boats race side-by-side until Kazim's gun runs out of ammo. Indy boards Kazim's boat, knocks out an agent, and fights Kazim. Indy kicks Kazim into the water but rescues him before the boat is drawn toward a steamer's propeller.
